{"id":319748969,"lang":"java","time":"1 year, 2 months","timestamp":1586032244,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"2 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/319748969/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Happy Number","memory":"37.3 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public boolean isHappy(int n) {\n        HashMap<Integer, Boolean> seen = new HashMap<>();\n        while (true) {\n            if (seen.containsKey(n)) return false;\n            seen.put(n, true);\n            String num = String.valueOf(n);\n            n = 0;\n            for (int i = 0; i < num.length(); i++) {\n                n += Math.pow(Integer.parseInt(num.substring(i, i+1)), 2);\n            }\n            if (n == 1) return true;\n        }\n\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"happy-number"}
